net.ttddyy.dsproxy.listener.logging

Class AbstractSlowQueryLoggingListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.ttddyy.dsproxy.listener.SlowQueryListener
      • net.ttddyy.dsproxy.listener.logging.AbstractSlowQueryLoggingListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QueryExecutionListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommonsSlowQueryListener, JULSlowQueryListener, Log4jSlowQueryListener, SLF4JSlowQueryListener, SystemOutSlowQueryListener

    public abstract class AbstractSlowQueryLoggingListener
extends SlowQueryListener
    Abstract class to log slow query. This class delegates actual log writing to subclasses.
    Since:
    1.4.1
    Author:
    Tadaya Tsuyukubo

      • onSlowQuery

        protected void onSlowQuery(ExecutionInfo execInfo,
                           List<QueryInfo> queryInfoList,
                           long startTimeInMills)
        Description copied from class: SlowQueryListener
        Callback when query execution time exceeds the threshold. This callback is called only once per query if it exceeds the threshold time.
        Overrides:
        onSlowQuery in class SlowQueryListener
        Parameters:
        execInfo - query execution info
        queryInfoList - query parameter info
        startTimeInMills - time in mills when the query started
